answers.answer: Hi butterflygal,I'm not sure if you know you have posted this question in the Multiple Sclerosis forum or if the MedHelp health answers question box sent your question our way.  They do that automatically by key words and sometime the questions get misdirected.I think we would have to know a whole lot more about your situation before we could even begin to offer suggestions of what to do next.  You might post this question in the diabetes forum or the heart forum.feel better, Lulu

question: Not dizzyNot painBut find myslef falling down and having to lay down before i can get up
title: i have diabetes type 2, high cholesteral, and high blood pressure all being treated
